txt.en: Recover the sword of Kevoka from Frangan
Recover the sword of Mánas from Huisdán
Abb was a great leader and healer of the Hillmen of Rhudaur.  He was one of the last Chieftains taken into the service of the Enemy.
Kolmak was the second of the Hillman-chieftains who took service with the Enemy and often used fell poisons on his blade.
Seven swords have been stolen from Krúslë Lannan  and must be returned to their proper resting place.
Ánraig was the fiercest of those that were converted to the Enemy's evil cause and was often at the head of the armies brought against the people of Arthedain.
Guinokh was longest in the service of the Enemy and had the most malice and subtlety of those that wielded a blade under the Witch-king against Cardolan.
Innis was one of the lesser Chieftains converted by the enemy and rather wielded the bow than the sword.
Kevoka was one of the Hillmen-chieftains tricked into service of the Enemy.
Few men lived to tell tales of Mánas brutality, for he would often put his captives to a cruel death.
Recover the Sword of Abb from Owen
Recover the Sword of Kolmak from Ruraikh
Recover the sword of Ánraig from Tobaid
Recover the sword of Guinokh from Brekhin
Recover the sword of Innis from Dugald
